TopicTitle: Can we please keep the crew after changes?

Articles.Content: I've had problems with selecting a crew, making a quick change to the rocket, and then having the crew reset. Why exactly is this done? Is it possible to keep the crew you've selected through the changes?

What about using tweakables to set if a seat will be filled or not?

That way we will have crew on them even if the ones we set before aren't available.
